name: ROOT ACCESS
description:
*Highly recommended downloading for the best experience* 

ROOT ACCESS is a 3D first person adventure game where a virus (the player) has made its way into the game’s files! Venture downwards through a manmade tree, where your goal is to slowly destroy all aspects of the game. Eventually making your way into the game’s source files to remove it at its roots. Destruction affects everything: your surroundings, your abilities, yourself. A reverse-progression experience where the mechanics and environment begin to fade away.

// [E] to delete source files (when prompted)

// [WASD] or [Arrow Keys] to move

// [Spacebar] to jump,  again in midair to double jump

// [Esc] to pause the game


// Nam Nguyen - Lead Design/Concept | Level Design | Assets (3D)

// Josh Peterson - Programmer 

// Jasper Fedden- Programmer | Level Design | Playtest

// Benjamin Barett - UI Design

// Faith A. - Assets (Textures)

// Howard Rhee - Level Design

// Ryan Cheung - Music | Sound

[Made for GGJ2023 in ~3 days]
